long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pomodoro® Time Management Assistant

Boost your productivity, master your time, and enjoy every focused moment! Our Pomodoro® Time Management Assistant offers you:

🌟 Short & Long Breaks: Scientifically schedule your work and rest to keep your mind in peak condition.

⏳ Toolbar Icon with Countdown Timer: Keep track of remaining time at a glance and stay focused without missing a beat.

📊 Track Pomodoro History & Stats: Monitor your work achievements, understand your efficiency, and motivate yourself to improve.

⚙️ Configurable Long Break Intervals: Adjust your break times according to your personal needs and find the rhythm that suits you best.

⏲️ Customizable Timer Durations: Tailor your work and rest durations to perfectly fit your working habits.

🔔 Desktop & Tab Notifications: Get timely reminders so you never lose track of your breaks.

🎶 Audio Notifications with Over 20 Sounds: Choose your favorite sound to make every reminder invigorating.

⏰ Ticking Timer Sounds: Enjoy the classic ticking sound to help you stay focused.

Download now to experience the perfect blend of efficient work and relaxation, making every Pomodoro® session a stepping stone to your success!
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
Pomodoro® 时间管理助手

提升你的工作效率，掌控时间，享受每一个专注的瞬间！我们的 Pomodoro® 时间管理助手为你提供：

🌟 短暂与长时间休息：科学安排工作与休息，让你的大脑保持最佳状态。

⏳ 工具栏图标与倒计时器：随时查看剩余时间，保持专注，不再错过每一秒。

📊 记录 Pomodoro 历史与统计：追踪你的工作成果，了解你的效率，激励自己不断进步。

⚙️ 可配置的长休息间隔：根据个人需求调整休息时间，找到最适合你的节奏。

⏲️ 可配置的计时器时长：自定义工作和休息的时长，完美契合你的工作习惯。

🔔 桌面与标签通知：及时提醒，让你不再沉浸于工作而忘记休息。

🎶 多达 20 种音效的音频通知：选择你喜欢的声音，让每一次提醒都充满活力。

⏰ 滴答计时器声音：享受传统的计时体验，帮助你保持专注。


立即下载，体验高效工作与放松的完美结合，让每个 Pomodoro® 时段都成为你成功的助推器！

Pomodoro® 和 The Pomodoro Technique® 是由 Francesco Cirillo 所有的商标。Marinara 与 Pomodoro®、The Pomodoro Technique® 或 Francesco Cirillo 之间没有隶属或关联的关系。
